text: The men's 100 metres event at the 1990 Commonwealth Games was held on 27 and 28 January at the Mount Smart Stadium in Auckland. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Linford Christie '''' |Davidson Ezinwa '''' |Bruny Surin '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 5 of each heat (Q) and the next 6 fastest (q) qualified for the quarterfinals.
